Content.Text:
<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Who are you? I'm Otmar...
<PAGE>
Oh, you're the new farmer? Well, then, it's nice
to meet you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You certainly seem
excited to be awake, for some reason!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How are you
doing? Well? Well, that's good!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You're awfully
spirited for such an hour! You'll be the rooster
who wakes the world, I fear...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You're looking good! Guess
you've adjusted well to farm life, then?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello...?
<PAGE>
Oh, <MYNAME>, it's you. You're looking well.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello...<MYNAME>. How's your work going?
Well? ...I see. That's good to hear.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hello! Have you finished your work for the
day?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening...<MYNAME>. Are you still on the
clock? I'm impressed. That's a work ethic from
another age, right there!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening...<MYNAME>. You must be tired
by now. You should take a rest.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a beautiful day today. Too beautiful to waste.
Maybe I should take a walk.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This weather is really quite aggravating. No one
comes to shop on a day like this.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunny weather is nice and all, but when it's this
hot on top of it, I just feel dry and unpleasant.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This weather is really quite aggravating. No one
comes to shop on a day like this.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a lovely day today. I'll bet it feels especially
nice at the top of the mountain.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This weather is really quite aggravating. No one
comes to shop on a day like this.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sun may be out, but it's certainly not
warming much. And this cold weather always
makes my back hurt...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not a fan of all this snow. I'm not sure I have it
in me to shovel it anymore...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you still working out in the fields? In this
weather?! You should at least take a rest until
the wind dies down!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh my, what're you doin' out in this heavy
snow? You could get stuck in the middle of
nowhere, and then what'd become of you?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Oh, <MYNAME>! 
I hear tell you're dating someone in town.
<PAGE>
Young love, is it? I hope you'll invite me to your
wedding!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I sometimes come here just to talk with Eda. It's
gotten to the point that I'd almost say
conversing with her is my new hobby.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't seem to catch any fish at all...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When customers come by, I often like taking
some time to chat with them. It's one of my
little joys in life.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I sometimes come here to buy certain
necessities, but I...erm...always seem to forget
which ones by the time I arrive!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so tiring, climbing all the way up here!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These forests are ancient, and people say there
are spirits that lurk within them. I've never seen
them myself, though...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are a lot of fish in that river. I fish here
often, but rarely ever catch any.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always walk around here for exercise.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's so tiring, climbing all the way up here!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here to see Fritz. He might not be the
world's most tactful person, but he's got a heart
of gold.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Every time I pass by here, I always have to stop
and listen to the sound of the water wheel for a
moment. It's like music to my ears...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are a lot of paddies around here. I hope
they can yield some top-quality rice!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Elise is the one renting this land, last I heard.
And she certainly is doing a bang-up job with it!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you get old, you can't move your body as
well as you could when you were young. But I
still take mine for a walk whenever possible!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going out too, <MYNAME>? You're
certainly a hard worker!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's life treating you here? Well, you have
plenty of time to get used to it, so even if it's not
all sunshine and roses now...it will be!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you like fishing?
<PAGE>
I dabble in fishing from time to time, but I'm
quite terrible at it. Which is fine, really.
<PAGE>
I just enjoy being out in nature and dropping my
line. It's the experience that counts, not the end
result.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm in charge of the General Store, but as you
can probably see, business ain't exactly boomin'!
<PAGE>
Still...I'm mostly doing it to keep myself from
going senile.
<PAGE>
Sometimes, when customers drop by, I stop
them for a friendly chat. It's my favorite pastime
these days.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been living in this house since I was born.
I've never once left the town.
<PAGE>
My children are living in other towns, and my
wife passed away a long time ago...but I just
keep on clinging to this land I love.
<PAGE>
My children have offered to let me live with
them, but I like this place too much to leave it.
And I still want to work, besides!
<PAGE>
I'll live here forever if I can, no matter what may
happen. I just hope I don't become a burden on
the good people here...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've gotten rather forgetful in my old age.
Sometimes, I even forget how much things
cost.
<PAGE>
But my customers are kind enough to remember
for me and pay what they owe; no hoodwinking
chicanery in this town!
<PAGE>
Some people even pay a little more than the item
is worth...and I'm truly grateful for their
kindness.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I have a story to tell you. And since
you're such an understanding person, I'm certain
you'll believe me, at least.
<PAGE>
A long time ago, I caught a truly enormous fish.
Bigger than me, even.
<PAGE>
It was a long struggle. Lasted deep into the
night, it did. But I got it. Only...it was too big to
bring home.
<PAGE>
So I thought it would be better to leave it until
morning. Then I thought...what if the foxes eat
it? So I sighed, and I released it.
<PAGE>
...You believe me, don't you?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You've been so nice to me...
<PAGE>
Since I live alone, I'm very grateful to you for
dropping by to chat with an old man like me
from time to time.
<PAGE>
I might not make much sense sometimes, what
with senility kicking in...but I always appreciate
your visits. Always.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, that's pretty generous of you. And it's
my favorite, too! Thank you! You made my day!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is that for me? It's lovely.
<PAGE>
I shall graciously accept it. Thank you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Something for me? Ah, how'd you know I
enjoyed these? Thanks!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Well, thank you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? Is this for me...?
...I'm not much of a fan of these, but it's the
thought that counts, so I'll take it. Thank you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Errrrr... Please tell me that's not for me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If you insist, I'll take it. But let it be known, I'm
no fan.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh dear. So you brought something like this, did
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You realize I have false teeth, right? *sigh* But
it's rude to turn down a present, so I'll accept it.
Thank you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's quite flashy! Is it for me? Thank you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? Is this for me...?
...I'm not much of a fan of these, but it's the
thought that counts, so I'll take it. Thank you!
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a long time since we last talked, hasn't
it? I don't need any gifts. I just want to know
what's new in your life!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel bad receiving so many presents from you. I
don't think I'm comfortable accepting any more
today.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, that's pretty generous of you. And it's
my favorite, too! Thank you! You made my day!
<PAGE>
...What's that? You say it's for my birthday? Is
that
today?! I completely forgot!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is that for me? It's lovely. ...What's that? It's
a birthday present?
<PAGE>
Whose birthday is it? ...Mine?! Oh...uh...thank
you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Something for me? Ah, how'd you know I
enjoyed these? Thanks! ...Oh, it's a birthday
present?!
<PAGE>
Right... Thank you. I'd totally forgotten today
was my birthday!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a birthday present, for...me...? Well,
now...thank you for the thought.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? Is this for me? It's...a birthday gift?!
...I'm not much of a fan of these, but it's the
thought that counts, so I'll take it. Thank you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Errr... Please tell me that's not for me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...What? It's a present for my birthday?! ...I
suppose I have to take it, then. ...Thank you?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, my. So you brought something like this, did
you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You realize I have false teeth, right? *sigh* But
it's rude to turn down a present, so I'll accept it.
Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Wait, did you say it's a birthday present?
Today's my birthday?! Wow. I completely
forgot... Well, thank you again, then, I suppose!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you got me a birthday present? Wow, it's
quite...brilliant. I graciously accept! Thank you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? For me? Sure is sparkly,
but...well, I don't much care for those. Since it
is a gift, though, I'll accept it. Thank you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute bunny!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such a fluffy bunny!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When that chicken lays eggs, would you mind
bringing me some?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...It's a bit too fat, isn't it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...It's a bit too fat, isn't it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...It's a bit too fat, isn't it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...How precious.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...It's a bit too fat, isn't it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, what a beautiful flower. Hmm? Today's the
Flower Fair, you say?! ...Well, then, thank you
very much for the kind gesture!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather? I sell those at my shop. Is
something wrong with it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very nice ring. Are you going to give it
to someone special?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Such lovely ribbon. It's my favorite color! And
what's inside, I wonder...?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's very nicely wrapped. I wonder what's
inside...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, if I remember correctly...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I got it right?! I'm impressed! Happy birthday to
you. This is a gift from the heart. Please accept
it, and please enjoy!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today is...your birthday...isn't it? So...um...
Happy birthday!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Long time no see. How have
you been?
<PAGE>
I know my store is a bit lacking in wares, but I
hope you'll still come visit me from time to time.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, now, that's a nice outfit. It looks quite
comfortable!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of your work clothes. That's my
favorite color, you know!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That jacket certainly seems comfortable to wear.
I wouldn't mind something like that for myself...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never seen people wearing an outfit quite like
that before. Are those clothes from a foreign
country?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That jacket certainly looks comfortable to wear.
And those trousers look really tough; like they
could survive a war!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's quite a strange-looking outfit you've got
on. Seems exotic, like traditional garb from
some foreign land. But it looks good on you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, that's quite the stylish outfit you've got! If I
were a little younger, I'd wear that in a heartbeat.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That outfit sure looks expensive. You project an
air of elegance in it.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where'd you get that outfit? It's so...flashy...and
looks like y'can't move around in it too well.
Who'd choose to wear such a thing?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you wearing a skirt? ...What's that? It's
called a "kilt"? Isn't that just a fancy word that
means "a skirt for men"?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, you're sure looking snazzy. Are you going
somewhere special?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute outfit. It looks really good on you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, that's quite the stylish outfit you've got! If I
were a little younger, I'd wear that in a heartbeat.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very nice-looking jacket you've got on.
The skirt you're wearing with it is also rather
cute. It's a great look on you!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Have you become a doctor, now? I'll be
counting on you to help give me my bill of
health, then.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, now, that's an interesting costume.
...But why are you wearing it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, now, that's an interesting costume.
...But why are you wearing it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Don't I know you? Are you...one of the
maids working for Elise, perhaps? Don't tell me,
now. I'll figure it out...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is that...a penguin costume?
What sort of zaniness are you up to...?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, where are you going in that armor? ...Has
the battle for our futures finally begun?!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a nice hat. It screams "farmer general"!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like that hat. It looks good on you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, that's a nice hat. It looks perfectly suited to
a day of fishing.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's the hat farmers wear, huh? It looks good
on you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's the hat farmers wear, huh? It looks good
on you.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a strange-looking hat. Is it from a far-off
land, perhaps?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sporting the chef look, I see. Are you going to
make me something delicious, then?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat looks like it's seen some things! I
wonder what its history might be...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those are nice glasses. They look like you could
drop them and nothing would happen.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These are nice glasses. They look...vintage. And
I'm vintage, so I love it!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you're lookin' to buy something, would you
please talk to me from the front side of the
counter? I have to keep up appearances, y'know.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...Oh... Ohhh... Ohhhhhhhh... Such a...huge
fish... Zzz...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about my bedtime now. You should go home
and sleep too.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Give me a second. I'm eating.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so nice having a bench to sit on. Now I can
sit back and rest whenever I get tired!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That wooden box would make for great storage.
I bet I could find a million uses for it around the
house...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look, a scarecrow! That sure takes me back.
You used to see scarecrows all over the place,
but they're pretty rare nowadays.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That wagon's pretty beat up. I wonder what use
it could possibly be at this point...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a paper lantern, huh? I used to sell those
at my store, but they didn't exactly fly off the
shelves.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A stone lantern for one's garden... How quaint
and elegant!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice desk. But...it's not really very useful
here, is it?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's called a tea bench, isn't it? I love the look
of the red cloth.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This type of umbrella is what's known as a
"Garden Parasol," right?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's pretty distinctly a beach parasol, isn't it?
Strange to see one somewhere other than the
beach. But hey, shade is shade!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Strange to see a sign set up in a place like this.
What's it say?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've seen that dog statue before. It's...from an old
story, about a clever dog that went on a journey
with a young child, if memory serves.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that pump still working, I wonder?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if it's still possible to draw water from
this well. I like well water... It has a certain
earthy flavor to it, you know?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's quite the watchtower. I dare you to go all
the way to the top!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this mossy plaza. It seems like a nice place
to kick back and relax.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this mossy plaza. It seems like a nice place
to kick back and relax.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a long time since I last saw a daruma
doll. How do you use those things again?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a heck of a snow cave. Is it sturdy
enough that we can go inside and sit down,
though?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...This is a New Year's decoration, right? In
some countries, people put them in front of their
houses on the first day of the year.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's...a bamboo decoration for a garden,
right?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Because I'm so forgetful, I quite like cacti. They
grow even when you forget to water them.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Because I'm so forgetful, I quite like cacti. They
grow even when you forget to water them.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used to grow bonsai, but those things require a
lot of care and attention. Eventually, I got fed up
with it and decided, never again!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not easy to care for cherry blossom trees,
but when they're in bloom, it's all worth it!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maidenhair trees are so beautiful when they turn
yellow...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The hedges around here sure do spruce up the
scenery, don't they? It's like I always say: hedge
your bets, and bet on hedges.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo bushes in the middle of town are an
odd sight, don't you think?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at the contours on that pine tree. You
could set your clock to those, they're so perfect!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not easy to care for cherry blossom trees,
but when they're in bloom, it's all worth it!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maidenhair trees are so beautiful when they turn
yellow...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The wooden walls here really give the town a
secluded, austere appearance.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, this place is certainly...white. I much
prefer that to using too much color, though. It
looks simpler and cleaner.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lot of this decor is black. It must be hard to
see at night. I'd best be careful if I ever need to
sneak through for anything!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, is this what's popular at the moment? Must
just be too stylish for old fogies like me...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This reminds me of Oak Tree Town the way it
once was. It looked just like...well... Actually, I
don't really remember...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an interesting-looking doll. So red, and
roly-poly... I bet if I stocked some of these at my
shop, they'd sell, no problem!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, bamboo! Used to be you couldn't walk two
steps without bumping into some of this.
Or...wait...maybe that was the next town over...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become awfully famous. The
other day, I had a customer from a foreign
country for the very first time!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is much busier than it used to be. I
guess that means more customers for me, huh?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never left this town, so I don't really have
much basis for comparison, but...is this really
such a "backwoods" place, like people say?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town used to be much smaller, but it's
gotten a whole heck of a lot busier over time.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this town just the way it is, but others
aren't quite so easily satisfied. They want to
attract tourists and host events and such...

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's amazing how big this town has become.
People gather here from all over the world now.
Who could've ever seen THAT coming?

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's your allowance for today. Use it well.
